DESCRIPTION: Kicks a user from the server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}kick @user reason** ~ Kick the user and sets the reason which will be DM'd to the user + posted in the modlog (if activated).
EXTENDED_LINE_2: The role of G4M3R needs to be above the highest role to moderate effectively. Make sure the bot has the permissions to kick on your server.
HIGHER_ROLE: Your highest role is not high enough to ban this member.
UNKICKABLE: Could not kick this member, make sure that my role is above the highest role of the user you want to ban and try again.
TITLE: **{{user}}**, you have been kicked from [**{{guildName}}**]
